rooms.description: Wide and accessible entrance with ramp for wheelchair access. Incorporates Mediterranean style with arched doorways.
Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows that provide ample natural light. Decorated in Mediterranean style with wooden beams and stone accents.
Modern, wheelchair-accessible kitchen with open-plan layout adjacent to dining area. Mediterranean finishes such as terracotta tiles and decorative ironwork are incorporated.
Open dining space integrated with the kitchen, featuring wide floor-to-ceiling windows for a bright ambiance. Accessibility ensured with no steps.
Larger bedroom designed for one of the joint family members, with ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows. Includes an en-suite bathroom.
A comfortable bedroom for guests or additional joint family members, designed with accessible features including wider doorways and ramps if necessary.
Accessible bathroom with grab bars, non-slip flooring, and additional space for wheelchair maneuverability. Includes storage and ample lighting.
Two-car garage located at the front or side of the house, designed with a wide entrance and wheelchair-accessible ramp to the main living area.
Multi-purpose room for storage or laundry, ensuring accessibility and ease of use within the household. Incorporates Mediterranean design elements.
Space designated for housing appliances like water heater, HVAC units, and other utilities, designed with sufficient ventilation and in line with local building norms.

openings.description: Accessible entrance door at the front, featuring a ramp for wheelchair access. In keeping with Vastu principles, oriented to face a favorable direction.
Large windows installed in living areas and master bedroom to maximize natural light. Designed with energy-efficient glazing that aligns with Mediterranean aesthetics.
Double garage door facilitating easy access and large vehicle entry, designed for both functionality and aesthetic appeal in the overall Mediterranean style.
Open balcony adjoining the living area to overlook the garden. Features a railing design that is both secure and in keeping with Mediterranean charm.
